Capacity.description: This is the schema definition for the Capacity of a device. It represents the properties for capacity for any data store.
Capacity.longDescription: This composition may be used to represent storage capacity.  The sum of the values in Data, Metadata, and Snapshot shall be equal to the total capacity for the data store.

CapacityInfo.description: The capacity of specific data type in a data store.
CapacityInfo.longDescription: This composition may be used to represent the utilization of storage capacity.

CapacitySource.description: A description of the type and source of storage.
CapacitySource.longDescription: This type may be used to represent the source and type of storage capacity.  At most one of the ProvidingDrives, ProvidingVolumes or ProvidingPools properties may have a value.  If any of ProvidingDrives, ProvidingVolumes or ProvidingPools reference more than one resource, allocation of capacity across those resources is implementation dependent.

title: #Capacity.CapacitySource
